meanings.definition: To look or glance at something
meanings.sent1: She gandered at the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent2: He gandered at the interesting book cover.
meanings.sent3: The cat gandered at the bird outside the window.
meanings.sent4: The detective gandered at the clues, trying to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The child gandered at the stars, amazed by their brightness.

meanings.definition: To take a brief or casual look at something
meanings.sent1: They gandered at the menu before deciding what to order.
meanings.sent2: I gandered at the map to find our location.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel gandered at the acorns before choosing one to eat.
meanings.sent4: The student gandered at the clock, waiting for the bell to ring.
meanings.sent5: The hiker gandered at the trail ahead, planning the route to take.
